name: @uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-manifest
description: Use TypeScript to write manifest.json of uni-app
author: KeJun

scripts.build: rimraf --glob packages/*/dist && pnpm -r --filter=./packages/* run build && pnpm -r run build-post
scripts.play:mp-weixin: pnpm dev && pnpm -C playground run dev:mp-weixin
scripts.build:mp-weixin: pnpm build && pnpm -C playground run build:mp-weixin
scripts.play:h5: pnpm dev && pnpm -C playground run dev:h5
scripts.build:h5: pnpm build && pnpm -C playground run build:h5
